question.question: Which of the following is a key principle in the 4 therapeutic preamble rules (2C-288-PC-A02) that are crucial for managing hemorrhoidal pathology?
question.option_a: Always prescribe antibiotics for all hemorrhoidal cases.
question.option_b: Prioritize non-surgical treatments before considering surgery.
question.option_c: Immediately perform surgery on all patients with hemorrhoids.
question.option_d: Focus solely on pain management without addressing the underlying cause.
